name: DOGE World
description:
This game is just a fun platfomer game made for a game jam.

In this game you can switch between two characters each having their own platform tiles and in the game more you collect coins Dogecoin rate increases which helps you to unlock more levels. It is made in one and half day so i didn't have much time for many levels, so this game only have some demo levels. But new levels will be added soon to the game.

Enjoy and support ....

Challenge:

Can you beat my best time?? 

Send screenshot of your best time in the comments 

Instructions :

When you switch between characters the tile on which the cubois of same color( like red on red tile) doesn't affect by the change.  So with the help of that try to reach the destination.
